Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user selects (clicks, or navigates to via keyboard) a result that appears within autocomplete

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user submits a search (pressing enter within input element, or clicking submit element)

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackSearchResultsLoaded(searchTerm:resultCount:customerIDs:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user views a search product listing page

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackSearchResultClick(itemName:customerID:variationID:searchTerm:sectionName:resultID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user clicks a result that appears within a search product listing page

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackBrowseResultsLoaded(filterName:filterValue:resultCount:resultID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user views a browse product listing page

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackBrowseResultClick(customerID:variationID:filterName:filterValue:resultPositionOnPage:sectionName:resultID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user clicks a result that appears within a browse product listing page

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackRecommendationResultsView(podID:numResultsViewed:resultPage:resultCount:sectionName:resultID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user views a pod of recommendation results

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackRecommendationResultClick(podID:strategyID:customerID:variationID:numResultsPerPage:resultPage:resultCount:resultPositionOnPage:sectionName:resultID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user clicks an item that appears within a list of recommendation results

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackConversion(itemName:customerID:variationID:revenue:searchTerm:sectionName:conversionType:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user performs an action indicating interest in an item (add to cart, add to wishlist, etc.)

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackPurchase(customerIDs:sectionName:revenue:orderID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user completes an order (usually fired on order confirmation page)

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackPurchase(items:sectionName:revenue:orderID:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user completes an order (usually fired on order confirmation page)

Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.name: trackItemDetailLoad(customerID:itemName:variationID:sectionName:url:completionHandler:)
Classes/ConstructorIO.html#/s:23Construc.abstract: Track when a user views a product detail page

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.name: resultCount
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.abstract: The default number of results to request for

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.name: defaultItemSectionName
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.abstract: The default section to request items from

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.name: testCells
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.abstract: List of test cell information to associate with requests

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.name: segments
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.abstract: List of segments to associate with requests

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.name: baseURL
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.abstract: The base URL to make requests to

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.name: baseQuizURL
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html#/s:23Co.abstract: The base URL to make requests to

Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html.name: ConstructorIOConfig
Structs/ConstructorIOConfig.html.abstract: Struct encapsulating the configuration options needed to make requests

Classes/ConstructorIO.html.name: ConstructorIO
Classes/ConstructorIO.html.abstract: The main class to be used for getting autocomplete results and tracking behavioural data.
